author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2196] Adding IT that mocks up Vincent's situation in cargo, with a dislocated parent reference that should still be present in the multimodule build.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2196] Unit test to verify that (a) dislocated parent references resolve in a multimodule build containing both projects, and (b) that long lines of inheritance don't cause problems inheriting plugin configurations due to caching of processed project instances.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2196] Put back raw-project caching, to allow assemblyLineage(..) to use cached project data. Tests to follow...
